predictions.text: We use cookies, log files, pixel tags, local storage objects, and other tracking technologies to automatically collect information about your activities, such as your searches, page views, date and time of your visit, and other information about your use of the Quora Platform.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: We may also receive information about you from third parties, such as other users, partners (including ad partners), or our affiliated companies
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: To display interest-based advertising to you in the Quora Platform, to improve our advertising and measurement systems so we can show you relevant ads, and to measure the effectiveness and reach of ads and services

predictions.text: These are tiny graphics with a unique identifier, similar in function to cookies, which we use to track the online movements of users of the Quora Platform and the web pages of users of our Ad Services, and to personalize content.

predictions.text: We may use internal and third party analytics tools, including Google Analytics

predictions.text: Please note we do not change system behavior within the Quora Platform in response to browser requests not to be tracked
predictions.description: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway.

predictions.text: As described in our Cookie Policy, we may also work with third parties such as network advertisers to serve ads on the Quora Platform and on third-party websites or other media (e.g., social networking platforms), such as Google AdSense (more info here) and Facebook Audience Network (more info here
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: These third parties may use cookies, JavaScript, web beacons (including clear GIFs), Flash LSOs and other tracking technologies to measure the effectiveness of their ads and to personalize advertising content to you.
